DOC.brief_summary: Analyze the possible effect of the progesterone levels of the hCG administration on the oocyte embryo quality. The primary endpoint of this study is the pregnancy rate.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Premature Luteinization on the Oocyte Quality in Oocyte Donation Program.
DOC.criteria: Oocyte donors; age range: 18 34; BMI: 18 29; long protocol. PCO syndrome;
